Mapcolonies : MapProxy

Created by Shlomi Koncha, last modified on Feb 09, 2022

Source: https://mapproxy.org/

Overview

MapProxy is a tile server (WMS-C, TMS, WMTS, KML SuperOverlays). It reads data from:

  • WMS sources (1.0.0â€“1.3.0)

  • WMTS/TMS sources

  • Mapserver and Mapnik configurations

  • etc..

our supported protocol are:

  • WMTS - WMTS Usage Examples
